H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H6955.def: = man; ◄ one of the three sons of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► founder of {L:Kohathite<SDBH:קְהָתִי>} clan

H3878.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H4940.def: = a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H4605.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H2572.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H4539.def: = a relatively large piece of cloth, ► used to close off the entrance to (part of) a tent, or, more generally, as a covering

H1104.def: = action by which humans or animals cause food to pass down from their mouth to their esophagus; ≈ often used figuratively to denote destruction and death

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1648.def: = man, also known as {L:Gershom<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁום>}; ◄ one of the three sons of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► founder of the {L:Gershonite<SDBH:גֵּרְשֻׁנִּי>} clan

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H4940.def: = a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H4605.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H2572.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6633.def: = action by which humans serve a community

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H8476.def: = large animal of about 3 meters (10 feet) long, which lives in the sea, usually in small herds of twelve to fifteen animals; they swim slowly and feed in fairly shallow water on underwater weeds near mouths of rivers; they sometimes even move a short distance up the river; they need to come to the surface every few minutes to breathe, and they sometimes come out of the water to lie on rocks or sandbanks;◄ |iDugong dugong|i*; ► their skins make very good leather

H4539.def: = a relatively large piece of cloth, ► used to close off the entrance to (part of) a tent, or, more generally, as a covering
